🎟️ How to enter?

Enter here on espn.com

  • Group: 🍀 March Madness 2023
  • Password: madness2023

Please make sure you have joined our group WITH EACH BRACKET you wish to enter

If your bracket has not properly joined our group before tipoff, YOU'RE SHIT OUT OF LUCK.

⛑️ Troubleshooting

How can I confirm my bracket has joined the group?

When you click Join Group it should have a Entry is in this group status like the following image.

I'm lost, help?!?

✅ Entry Checklist

  • You have completed your bracket
  • Your bracket has entered the group
  • You have paid for each of your entries with a note listing their names
